file_content.text: You killed them all. Please, mercy. I--we will rededicate ourselves to the Empire!
You all have to die for your treason.
No mercy for traitors. [Kill]
What did you help Gonn with?
Tell me what you've done.
I--I helped a Jedi land on Hoth undetected. I believe he's searching for something in the starship graveyard wreckage. But that's all I know.
Tell my master everything. He will have interest in this.
Report to Baras.
The offense is too great to let you live.
Now you die. [Kill]
Go back to the planet and try to learn more about this.
Return to service, then.
Get back to your stations. If any of you stray again, you all die.
No more betraying us.
R--right away, my lord. Thank you for your mercy.
General Gonn, I'm happy to report that Jedi Knight Xerender has landed safely on Hoth. I saw to it personally.
You are a valuable asset to the Republic, Fawste. Some day, the rest of the Chiss will follow your lead.
Not if they know what's good for them.
They better not.
The rabbit comes out of his hole. Nice to see my information was correct.
General Gonn, in the flesh.
Good work leading me to General Gonn, Fawste.
[Lie] The Chiss works for me.
Men, we've got trouble! Rally around the general!
What's this, Fawste? Have you double-crossed me?
N--no, General, I'm not--I mean, uh....
Give it up, Fawste. The general's no dope.
[Lie] Come clean, Chiss.
General, it's a lie, I swear to you!
I believe you, Fawste. Sith are notorious liars. Don't worry, our bond is not broken.
Think carefully, Fawste. Who do you think will survive this?
You're in a tough spot now.
Uh... that's right, General. I'm sorry. Long live the Empire.
How quickly you run to save your own skin. Consider our alliance over.
How easily a traitor's allies can be convinced of his deceit.
See the life of a spy.
True enough. Still, someone tipped you off about this meeting.
Protect our allies as well.
I think I can guess who you are, Sith. For all of Darth Baras's covert manipulations, you have banged around the galaxy rather loudly.
Now Baras has finally found me... I'll have to be more careful moving forward.
No one can hide from me and my master.
It's futile.
I was successful before; I'll be successful again.
Your moving-forward days have come to an end.
Too late. [Attack]
Cease your operations, and I'll see to it you live.
Surrender.
Keeping the fringe systems free of the Empire is more important than my life.
Sith, you are Darth Baras's apprentice? We--we know of you. This, uh, this isn't what it seems.
I'll deal with you after, Chiss.
Your time is coming.
Fear not, Fawste. The Sith will not defeat me. My men and I have faced worse.
I wasn't born yesterday, traitor.
Shut up. [Choke Fawste]
Men, attack! Save our friends!
What is it then? I'm all ears.
Really?
As am I.
We, uh, cooperated with General Gonn in order to learn, uh, what he was up to. So that at the right time, we could betray him.
Nicely played, Fawste. You're a true lowlife. When this is over, so is our alliance.
Let me put an end to it.
This is over now! [Attack]
The Sith attacks!
The Empire will welcome you back.
Fear not, Fawste.
He's about to find himself all alone.
Abandon your station and live.
I'm offering mercy, General.
Never.
Men, take this Sith down.
